annotation_sentence: Yes, thank you. My name is Minji Lee. I am from Seoul. I study Business Administration at university. I, um, finished last year.

annotation_sentence: Ah, I chose because, um, I want to learn how to, like, manage company and people. I think it is very important skill.

annotation_sentence: Yes, we have group project. We make business plan for, um, new coffee shop. It was very exciting.

annotation_sentence: I like your company because, um, it is global. I want to work with different culture and, uh, learn more about international business.
